titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: PROFESSIONAL REGISTRATION ISSUER CODE (PATHOLOGY REPORT AUTHORISED BY) - Description

div.p: PROFESSIONAL REGISTRATION ISSUER CODE (PATHOLOGY REPORT AUTHORISED BY) is the same as attribute PROFESSIONAL REGISTRATION BODY CODE.
PROFESSIONAL REGISTRATION ISSUER CODE (PATHOLOGY REPORT AUTHORISED BY) is the code which identifies the PROFESSIONAL REGISTRATION BODY of the CARE PROFESSIONAL who authorised the pathology report.
